resources.name: Best practices of peer code review

steps.name: Review someone else's code
validations: Comment on a specific line number.
Learn something valuable from the comments.
Review the code in a timely manner.

steps.name: Have your code reviewed
validations: Create small pull requests, which are easier to review.
Take comments as constructive and not personal criticism.
Learn something valuable from the comments.
Respond to comments in a timely manner.
